definitions.definition: The condition of being mediocre ; having only an average degree of quality , skills etc.; no better than standard.
examples: Flexibility is good, but a tolerance for mediocrity carried far enough impairs operational capacity.

definitions.definition: A person with mediocre abilities or achievements .
The quality of being intermediate between two extremes; a mean .
A middle course of action; moderation , balance .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The condition of being mediocre ; having only an average degree of quality , skills etc.; no better than standard.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A person with mediocre abilities or achievements .
( now rare ) The quality of being intermediate between two extremes; a mean .
( obsolete ) A middle course of action; moderation , balance .
